title: Bread Pudding with Vanilla Sauce
instructions: Soak bread in milk for 1 hour. Preheat oven to 350°. Beat eggs, sugar, and vanilla. Stir into bread mixture. Add raisins if using. Pour melted butter into 9x13 pan. Add bread mixture. Bake 45-50 minutes until set. For sauce: Cream sugar and butter. Cook in double boiler, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Whisk in beaten egg, vanilla, and bourbon. Serve warm over bread pudding.
